mapper.sql: id, user_id, datasource_id, table_name, sql_query, result_file_path, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sql_query_history (user_id, datasource_id, table_name, sql_query, result_file_path, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{datasourceId}, #{tableName}, #{sqlQuery}, #{resultFilePath}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sql_query_history WHERE user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE sql_query_history SET result_file_path=#{resultFilePath} WHERE id=#{id}
